system.description:
When the regent’s clock fills, they blight the mortal world. The GM marks one:

A section of the region’s population is cursed and made monstrous.
Day is short and nights are starless. ppMonsters walk the world every full moon.
Weather becomes unnatural and devastating.
Plagues strike a section of the population.

If all are marked, the castle claims the mortal world and all is lost. Each player picks how their bloodline responds to the blight, and adjusts their stats:

  • You stayed safe, at the cost of withdrawing from the world. Say which of your connections suffered in your absence. +1 Chalices, -1 Coins.
  • You fought to push it back, but your best mystics lost their lives. Say what their sacrifice achieved. +1 Swords, -1 Wands.
  • You took some of the taint into your family. Say what lingering malady the blight has left you with. +1 Wands, -1 Chalice.
  • You waged a shadow war keeping society safe at great cost to your warriors. Say which settlement still stands thanks to you. +1 Coins, -1 Swords.
